# Bring Back the Classic Look: Restore AWS Buttons to Squared Corners!

Are you missing the classic squared-corner buttons in your AWS Management Console? Do the new rounded designs feel out of place in your workflow? **Introducing the "AWS Classic Buttons" Chrome Extension**‚Äîyour solution to bringing back the sharp, squared aesthetics you know and love!

## üî• Why You'll Love This Extension

- **Rediscover Familiarity**: Revert to the classic button design that enhances your navigation experience.
- **Boost Productivity**: A consistent interface can streamline your tasks and reduce visual distractions.
- **Lightweight & Efficient**: Minimal impact on browser performance‚Äîit's like it's not even there!
- **Zero Configuration Needed**: Install and enjoy immediately. No setup hassles.

## üåü Key Features

- **Instant Transformation**: Automatically converts all AWS console buttons back to squared corners.
- **Seamless Integration**: Works across all AWS services within the console without interference.
- **Automatic Updates**: Stay up-to-date with the latest AWS interface changes.

## üõ†Ô∏è How It Works

The extension injects custom CSS into your AWS Management Console pages, overriding the default styles to restore squared corners on all buttons. It's a simple tweak with a big impact on your user experience!

## üöÄ Get Started in Three Easy Steps

1. **Download** the "AWS Classic Buttons" extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. **Install** the extension in your Chrome browser.
3. **Refresh** your AWS Management Console page and enjoy the classic look!

## üîí Privacy & Security

Your security is our priority. This extension does not collect any personal data or interact with your AWS resources. It's open-source and transparent‚Äîfeel free to review the code yourself!

## üôå Join the Community

Love the extension? Found a bug? Want a new feature? Join our growing community of AWS enthusiasts:

- **GitHub**: Contribute or report issues on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/jturbide/AWS-Squared-Corners).
- **Feedback**: Leave a review or send us your thoughts. We're all ears!

---

Bring back the sharp edges and take control of your AWS interface today with **AWS Classic Buttons**! Your workflow will thank you.
